name.info: A short name for this Factor.  Factor is a particular aspect of the issue that is being considered.
name.label: Factor Name

errors.minLength: Factor Name must be at least 5 characters long
Password must be at least 5 characters long
Password must be at least 8 characters long
Password must be at least 8 characters long

search.info: Search for Polls or use the filter in the top-right menu
search.label: Find Polls

theme.info: Pick a Theme to focus your results
theme.label: Pick a theme

name.info: Select the name for this poll
name.label: Poll Issue

errors.minLength: Poll Issue must be at least 3 characters long

factors.info: Select the Factors of the poll

labels.info: Select matching Tag(s) for this poll
labels.label: Tag(s)

locations.info: Select the location(s) of the poll (Continent(s), Country(ies), State(s), City(ies))

timeframe.info: Select the Start and End dates for the poll

theme.info: Select the defining theme of this poll
theme.label: Theme

A.info: What is the result of the poll in case A.
A.label: Outcome A

errors.minLength: Outcome A must be at least 5 characters long

B.info: What is the result of the poll in case B.
B.label: Outcome B

errors.minLength: Outcome B must be at least 5 characters long

labels.info: Select matching Tag(s) for this poll
labels.label: Tag(s)

cities.info: Select one or more Cities to which this poll will apply
cities.label: City(ies)

continents.info: Select one or more Continents to which this poll will apply
continents.label: Continent(s)

countries.info: Select one or more Countries to which this poll will apply
countries.label: Country(ies)

states.info: Select one or more States to which this poll will apply
states.label: State(s)

A.info: The Position for Outcome A for this Factor.
A.label: Position A

errors.minLength: Position A must be at least 5 characters long

B.info: The Position for Outcome B for this Factor.
B.label: Position B

errors.minLength: Position B must be at least 5 characters long

startDate.info: Select the date when this poll starts
startDate.label: Start Date

errors.min: Start Date must be greater than today

endDate.info: Select the last date when this poll open
endDate.label: End Date

errors.min: End Date must be greater than today
errors.greaterThanOrEquals: End Date must be on or after Start Date
